Small Academy Big Hearts

Hello, Welcome to Una Brazilian Jiu Jitsu. Let us tell you a little bit about our school and what we have to offer you. Its rare to find a BlackBelt Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu instructor in the Queens/Metro area, here at UNA Bjj we have two 2nd degree BlackBelt Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu instructors offering top quality instructions directly taught by one of the Best Bjj Fighters to come out of Brazil 5th Degree Blackbelt Master Alexandre Soca Freitas. We Welcome and Invite all levels! For beginners that may feel intimidated or nervous about trying out the art of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, DONT WORRY! We work hard in creating a STRONG fundamentals program that is easy to understand and learn. Most importantly our students are friendly and respectful and come to class to learn and train. We don't allow "bullies" or show- offs in our classes, and if we see that tendency in a student, we work with them so they can learn to be respectful and courteous to their fellow students. We encourage a supportive, learning atmosphere at all times. A Family Environment! And ABSOLUTELY NO PRESSURE to sign up right away. We want to make sure you find a BJJ Academy thats fits YOU! You will be given all the information you need to join but after that its up to you! personal attention

Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu

There’s a reason so many of our beginner students, training less than a year, are winning tournaments. It’s the personal attention you get from our top ranked instructors that makes the difference. You will start off each class with a combination of simple drills and calisthenics to get you warmed up. Then you will be shown a technique by one of the instructors which you will practice several times on each side to gain familiarity with the move. This will be repeated, and then you will move on to controlled sparring. Sparring, closely watched by the instructors, goes in rounds that last up to several minutes each. This is, without a doubt, the most grueling part of the workout. The combination of calisthenics, drilling and sparring is what will get you in the best shape of your life, improving your mood, energy and stamina. We welcome you to come in for a week of free classes and feel the difference!

Muay Thai

Increase your strength, conditioning, and mobility while learning an aresenal of offensive moves. Build your confidence!

Kids Jiu-Jitsu

We offer one of the TOP Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu program in the Queens area for kids. Our childrens classes are 45 minutes to one hour in length. We have 3 group programs: Little Champs - 4 to 6 year olds Junior program - 7 to 10 year olds Youth program - 10 and up. Our MAIN Goal is to give your child CONFIDENCE! Confidence to be happy, healthy, hard working, strong kids. Through this Positive experience we hope that they will not only make Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu apart of their lifestyle, but more importantly lead a Successful life outside the mats. Childrens classes run as such; First your child will do simple warm up exercises such as stretching, running, calisthenics to help prevent injuries. After this they will move on to Brazilian Jiu Jitsu drills where we will show your child a technique by demonstration, and then the class will pair off with partners of similar size and skill, and practice the technique several times on each side. By doing this your child becomes proficient in executing the technique, thereby encouraging their confidence to grow. After we go over techniques, we pair your son/daughter off with a partner and they practice sparring with the techniques they have learned. Our children range in age from 4 to 12 years old. Separate classes are conducted for different age groups.

"Always assume that your oppenent is going to be bigger, stronger, and faster than you: so that you learn to rely on technique, timing, and leverage rather than brute strength"
